storyInfo: This is nothing but the past of a normal man; the memories of times bygone.

attributes.content: You shouldn't follow me.
Where I am going, the flames of war rage unchecked.
You'd only be in the way. No need to get yourself killed.
Savra, what are you doing, standing there? Get down if you want to live!
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: *Sarkaz profanity*! Incoming! Take cover and keep your head down!
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: *Cough* *cough*...
You still alive?!
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: I'm fine.
They found our vantage point. We don't have much time left! Get a move on!
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: Again, so soon?!
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: Argghhh! Son of a...! My leg!
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: (Uses Arts)
This way!
*Cough*. Thanks, brother.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: All I did was find us some cover. No need to thank me.
Is your leg doing okay?
I'm fine. I've been scratched up like this many times before. I'll be okay with a bandage.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: I'm probably not one to talk, but you don't seem like you can hold your own in a fight that well. I'm surprised you managed to survive this long.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: I saw you use Arts to move the cover. That's the technique of a seasoned veteran.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: How long have you been on the battlefield?
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: I've been through training many times, but I'm afraid this is my first deployment.
I only made it this far thanks to luck. I haven't done anything too great.
Well, you're a humble one, I'll give you that.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: Anyway, we really can't keep this up for much longer.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: The bigwigs are probably having an easy time, but this is starting to be a bit too much to bear for the rest of us.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: Looks like we're the only ones left here. I wonder how the others are doing.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: I got separated from my team... Our ambush failed, and the enemy scattered us.
It doesn't look like much is happening up ahead. I'm guessing anyone who charged up ahead are all...
Well, what a coincidence. It's the same for me.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: I'm not expecting them to go back to help me at this point.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: The mission may be a failure, but I'm not planning on dying here.
I'll scout out our surroundings. We may be trapped, but there has to be a way to break out of this.
Scout? You?
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: Listen, I'm not trying to look down on you, brother.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: But I promise, it doesn't matter how much cover your Arts can make you. The moment you poke your head out, you'll be blown to pieces.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: My suggestion: We stay here and observe.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: I'm afraid we can't do that.
3 o'clock... We've got company.
Those freaking Kuranta?
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: They're light infantry. Most likely the Kuranta mercenaries. There may be others as well... They work together fairly often, after all.
Once they charge in here, we won't have anywhere to run.
They might even have some caster drones with them.
How'd you know that much?
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: Simple deduction, guesswork, and experience.
I could be wrong, of course, but that should more or less be it.
We may stand out if we go now, but we can't hide here for very long.
If you know so much about them, do you have a way to take them out too?
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: I'm afraid not with my Arts. I'll probably be killed the moment I try to attack.
Honestly, running away is about all I can manage right now.
Hahahaha, sounds like whoever hired you really got a lemon.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: They're losing this war because they're too stingy and only bought men like you. You get what you pay for.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: By the way, before I forget...
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: What's your name, Savra?
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: I have many names. You can call me 46A for now.
attributes.name: 46A

attributes.content: Heh, is that a name now? Sounds more like a model number for some kind of appliance.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: It's just one of my codenames. You can call me that for the time being.
attributes.name: 46A

attributes.content: Well, it sounds to me you haven't made up your mind.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: My name isn't important.
attributes.name: 46A

attributes.content: Guess it isn't. Looks like you're the same as me. Just playing it by ear, earning our keep.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: Was that an explosion?!
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: Quick, 46A! Let's go!
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: I've been a merc for a long time, but this is my first time seeing anyone use drones to guide artillery fire.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: Those drone casters are getting way too hard to deal with these days.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: If we'd found out sooner, so many of us would still be alive...
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: I tried to cover our tracks. Hopefully that will buy us some time.
attributes.name: 46A

attributes.content: You know all kinds of Arts, don't you?
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: Why don't you take care of these wounds for me while you are at it?
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: Sorry, I don't know healing Arts.
attributes.name: 46A

attributes.content: It's fine. Just figured I'd ask.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: Our medic was the second one to go missing.
attributes.name: 46A

attributes.content: Don't let it get to you, brother. It happens pretty often out here.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: If it wasn't for you, the Kuranta would've blown a hole through my guts already.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: So nobody else made it out?
attributes.name: 46A

attributes.content: Looks like it.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: But that also means we're safe.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: Can you walk on your own?
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: I'm fine.
attributes.name: 46A

attributes.content: Let's keep going, then. The rendezvous point shouldn't be much further. If we keep this up, we should be there in about an hour.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: Good.
attributes.name: 46A

attributes.content: I really backed the wrong horse this time. The nobles were paying top dollar, so I figured this one was a sure win.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: Who knew we'd get all those mortar shells dropped on us? The moment that happened, everyone just took off, running for dear life.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: I feel sorry for those brothers I've fought alongside over the years.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: They got their money, but at what cost?
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: *Sigh*...
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: How about you, 46A? You here because of how much they were willing to pay, too?
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: There were some supplies I needed.
attributes.name: 46A

attributes.content: Hah, no need to sugarcoat it like that. All of us are putting our lives on the line to earn our crust.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: I'm looking for someone as well.
attributes.name: 46A

attributes.content: Looking for someone? What, on the battlefield?
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: That's correct.
attributes.name: 46A

attributes.content: Who are you looking for? Family? An enemy?
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: Someone I owe my life.
attributes.name: 46A

attributes.content: Hoh.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: That's interesting.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: Well, it sounds like something you'd do, but you're probably looking in the wrong place.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: It's a life debt, and—
attributes.name: 46A

attributes.content: Fine, whatever. Let me give you a bit of advice. Don't let yourself be taken advantage of!
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: I wasn't going to say this, but you're a weird one. Do you really think you can find the one who saved your life in Kazdel?
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: Maybe they weren't even trying to save you.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: Think about all those men you've worked for up till now, all the people you've worked with. All of them ready to turn against you at a moment's notice.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: Maybe the moment you find them, they'll—
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: I never imagined I would make such a mistake. I didn't see the attack coming at all.
Were those explosives? Arts?
My ears are buzzing.
*Pant*... *pant*...
attributes.name: 46A

attributes.content: But I'm not going to die here.
Even if I can't see anything, even if I have to crawl my way out of here, I am going to live.
You always make it through everything alive, Savra.
But I never thought you'd make it this far.
You are not like those good-for-nothings.
Who are you...?
attributes.name: 46A

attributes.content: You've made it this far. You have my approval.
I guess I must also give you a conclusion.
Will you face your past?
Or will you face the future?
Make your decision.
The Savra feebly holds his staff up.
Can I come with you this time, Owl?
attributes.name: 46A

attributes.content: Rise and shine, young'un.
attributes.name: Rangers

attributes.content: Ughh......
attributes.name: 12F

attributes.content: What are you doing here, Mr. Rangers...?
attributes.name: 12F

attributes.content: Everyone else is busy today, so it's just us two Savra sharing drinks and conversation.
attributes.name: Rangers

attributes.content: Do you remember now?
attributes.name: Rangers

attributes.content: R-Right... It's coming back to me.
attributes.name: 12F

attributes.content: Here, have some cold water.
attributes.name: Rangers

attributes.content: Thank you.
attributes.name: 12F

attributes.content: Try rubbing your eyes. Harder.
attributes.name: Rangers

attributes.content: *Phew*... *huff*.
attributes.name: 12F

attributes.content: This is how I used to sober myself up when I was your age. It does the trick, doesn't it?
attributes.name: Rangers

attributes.content: I suppose. Thank you, Mr. Rangers.
attributes.name: 12F

attributes.content: No need to thank me. We're both Savra.
attributes.name: Rangers

attributes.content: This is a kind of remedy I came up with. Only works on us folk.
attributes.name: Rangers

attributes.content: Were you dreaming, 12F? You seemed rather stiff.
attributes.name: Rangers

attributes.content: Oh, I guess I did have a rather strange dream.
attributes.name: 12F

attributes.content: Something from the past came back to me, that's all.
attributes.name: 12F

attributes.content: Tell me. What's your name?
I... I don't have a name... Only a codename.
attributes.name: 46A

attributes.content: Well, you just follow me from here on out. Like I said, there'll be far more dangers waiting ahead of you.
How far you can make it. Well, that depends on you.
Who you've been up till now just died here. Today is the day you died. It's also the day you were born.
Right, why don't I give you a new name as a present?
Let's see. It's March 3rd today...
Alright, you'll be 12F from here on out.
